title: Introduction to Python
description: Learn Python basics including variables, data types, and control structures (if statements, loops). Complete at least 5 exercises.

title: Working with Data Structures
description: Dive into lists, dictionaries, and functions. Practice by creating functions that manipulate these data structures. Complete at least 5 exercises.

title: Develop a Small Project
description: Choose a simple project (e.g., a calculator or a to-do list) and implement it using the concepts learned. Document your code and prepare for a presentation.

title: JavaScript Basics
description: Learn about data types, variables, and operators in JavaScript.

title: Control Structures
description: Study conditionals (if, switch) and loops (for, while).

title: Functions and Scope
description: Understand how to declare functions, scope, and closures.

title: Objects and Arrays
description: Learn about objects, arrays, and methods to manipulate them.

title: DOM Manipulation
description: Explore how to access and modify HTML elements with JavaScript.

title: Events and Listeners
description: Learn about handling user events like clicks and form submissions.

title: Build a Simple App
description: Create a small interactive web application using the skills learned.
